props.name: ariaLabel
props.docblock: Text describing the ChipCarousel for screen readers.

description.text: Text describing the ChipCarousel for screen readers.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name for the ChipCarousel.

description.text: Specifies class name for the ChipCarousel.

props.name: items
props.docblock: Specifies array of `Chip` elements to be rendered inside the carousel.

description.text: Specifies array of `Chip` elements to be rendered inside the carousel.

props.name: disableOpacityMasks
props.docblock: Whether the default opacity masks should be shown at the start/end, if applicable.

description.text: Whether the default opacity masks should be shown at the start/end, if applicable.

props.name: onScrollPrevious
props.docblock: Callback function for when the user scrolls to the previous element.

description.text: Callback function for when the user scrolls to the previous element.

props.name: onScrollNext
props.docblock: Callback function for when the user scrolls to the next element.

description.text: Callback function for when the user scrolls to the next element.

props.name: canScrollHorizontal
props.docblock: Whether users can scroll within the overflow container.

description.text: Whether users can scroll within the overflow container.

props.name: offset
props.docblock: A value specifying the distance the scroll should move.

description.text: A value specifying the distance the scroll should move.

props.name: offsetType
props.docblock: Type of offset value (percentage or fixed).

description.text: Type of offset value (percentage or fixed).

props.name: gap
props.docblock:
Specifies inner space between children blocks.

Valid values are based on `the spacing classes`:
`0, 0.5, ... 6`.

description.text:
Specifies inner space between children blocks.

Valid values are based on `the spacing classes`:
`0, 0.5, ... 6`.
